name: PENTAGOD
description:
2 to 4 player.

Square-shaped people battle in a battle royale arena as a sacrifice to the superior PENTAGOD. Kill your friends before they kill you in this dodge-ball inspired game.

Features :

  • Controller support
  • Native DS4 support with LED color changing
  • PONG physics
  • Character selection screen

Art : Gabriel Choquette

Code : Thomas Gauthier-Caron

Music : Arthur Bourdon-Durocher
